definition: cylindrical bamboo or wire frame used to constrain a pig during transport
enclosing frame made of bamboo, wire etc/cage/basket/steamer basket/to cover/to cage/to embrace/to manipulate through trickery
to drown sb in a wicker basket, a form of 沉潭[chen2 tan2]

sentences.english: Sensing food, a roach peers into a two-foot-tall pitcher plant.
sentences.chinese: 發現食物，一隻蟑螂仔細觀察着兩英尺高的豬籠草。

sentences.english: This is true with Asian Pitcher Plants.
sentences.chinese: 這纔是真正的亞洲豬籠草。

sentences.english: Do Fujian Pu Tian City have common nepenthes?
sentences.chinese: 福建莆田有沒有豬籠草？

sentences.english: Like figures in a shadow theater, silhouettes of prey show through a Philippine pitcher plant.
sentences.chinese: 菲律賓豬籠草獵物剪影，有點像皮影戲。

sentences.english: I was shocked to find a species of pitcher plant called Nepenthes mirabilis var.
sentences.chinese: 我很震驚地發現一個種豬籠草變種物種。
